query:
SELECT DISTINCT u.id, u.name, u.description, u.owner_id
                FROM universe u
                WHERE u.owner_id = ?
                   OR u.id IN (
                       SELECT a.universe_id
                       FROM account a
                       WHERE a.id = ?
                          OR a.id IN (
                              SELECT ao.account_id
                              FROM account_owner ao
                              WHERE ao.owner_id = ?
                          )
                   )
                ORDER BY u.id
